org.netbeans.api.search.provider

Class SearchInfoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.search.provider.SearchInfoUtils

  • public final class SearchInfoUtils
extends Object
    Class containing methods for getting SearchInfo instances for nodes and files.

    • Method Detail

      • getSearchInfoForNode

        @CheckForNull
public static SearchInfo getSearchInfoForNode(@NonNull
                                                            Node node)
        Gets a search info for node.

        Algorithm for getting search info:

        1. Look for SearchInfoDefinition in lookup of the node. If found, create and return search info for this definition.
        2. Look for SubTreeSearchOptions in lookups of this node and its ancestors. If found, check if the node has a FileObject (possibly as primary file of a DataObject) in its lookup, and, if so, create search info for recursive searching in the file object, using filters defined in found SubTreeSearchOptions.
        3. Check whether the node has a FileObject (possibly as primary file of a DataObject) in is lookup. If so, create default search info for that file object. Default means that the file object will be searched recursively, using default filters.
        4. Return null.
        Returns:
        Search info for a node. If no search info was defined and it cannot be created for this node, null is returned.
        See Also:
        FileObject, DataObject, SearchInfoDefinition, SubTreeSearchOptions, findDefinedSearchInfo(org.openide.nodes.Node)

      • findDefinedSearchInfo

        @CheckForNull
public static SearchInfo findDefinedSearchInfo(@NonNull
                                                             Node node)
        Get a search info for a node, if it was explicitly defined in node's lookup, or in lookup of a ancestor node. Default search info is not created.
        Returns:
        Defined SearchInfo, or null if not available.
        See Also:
        getSearchInfoForNode(org.openide.nodes.Node)

      • createForDefinition

        @NonNull
public static SearchInfo createForDefinition(@NonNull
                                                      SearchInfoDefinition definition)
        Create a new SearchInfo for a SearchInfoDefinition instance.
        Parameters:
        definition - Search info definition.

      • createCompoundSearchInfo

        @NonNull
public static SearchInfo createCompoundSearchInfo(@NonNull
                                                           SearchInfo... delegates)
        Creates a SearchInfo compound of the given delegates. It combines the delegates such that:
        • its method SearchInfo.canSearch() returns true if and only if at least one of the delegate's canSearch() returns true
        • its method SearchInfo.createFilesToSearchIterator(SearchScopeOptions, SearchListener, AtomicBoolean) chains iterators of the delegates, skipping those delegates whose canSearch() method returns false
        Parameters:
        delegates - delegates the compound SearchInfo should delegate to
        Returns:
        created compound SearchInfo
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the argument is null

      • createEmptySearchInfo

        @NonNull
public static SearchInfo createEmptySearchInfo()
        Create a SearchInfo instance that is always unsearchable.
        Returns:
        Search info whose SearchInfo.canSearch() returns always null.

      • createSearchInfoForRoot

        @NonNull
public static SearchInfo createSearchInfoForRoot(@NonNull
                                                          FileObject root)
        Create a search info for a FileObject. Default filters will be used. If root is a folder, it will be searched recursively.
        Parameters:
        root - File of folder where recursive searching should start.

      • createSearchInfoForRoots

        @NonNull
public static SearchInfo createSearchInfoForRoots(@NonNull
                                                           FileObject[] roots)
        Create a search info for an array of FileObjects. Default filters will be used.

        Using this method is preferable to creating several SearchInfo instances for individual roots using createSearchInfoForRoot(FileObject) and then combining them with createCompoundSearchInfo(SearchInfo[]).

        Parameters:
        roots - Array of root files or folders.

      • createSearchInfoForRoots

        @NonNull
public static SearchInfo createSearchInfoForRoots(@NonNull
                                                           FileObject[] roots,
                                                           boolean useDefaultFilters,
                                                           @NonNull
                                                           SearchFilterDefinition... extraFilters)
        Create a search info for an array of FileObjects.
        Parameters:
        useDefaultFilters - True if default filters (visibility filter and sharability filter) should be used, false otherwise.
        extraFilters - Array of extra custom filters.
